goal.name: gettext
goal.description: Invokes the gettext:merge and gettext:dist goal.

goal.name: gettext:gettext
goal.description: Invokes xgettext to extract keys from source code.

goal.name: gettext:merge
goal.description: Invokes the gettext:gettext goal and invokes msgmerge to update po files.

goal.name: gettext:dist
goal.description: Generates ressource bundles. Invokes the gettext:dist-msgcat or gettext:dist-msgfmt goal depending on ${gettext.outputformat}.

goal.name: gettext:dist-msgcat
goal.description: Invokes msgcat to generate Java property files.

goal.name: gettext:dist-msgfmt
goal.description: Invokes msgfmt to generate Java class files.
